long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make picking your next airbnb easy. 

In one click, close all your airbnb tabs and see the key data in a table where you can add comments, ratings, and open the links up again. 

Why did I make this? 
Hello ðŸ‘‹ I'm Alex. 
I live nomadically with my partner and we have been using Airbnb a lot to find places to live. Regularly, we make a spreadsheet to rate and compare the places -  do we like the location, has it got a kitchen, is it work friendly? We ask these questions among a ton of others.

Airbnb is great - but it misses the usual user flow - the final pick!
https://alex-goff.medium.com/why-airbnbs-ui-is-frustrating-for-the-last-act-b5c573d9d242

Finally, I have got round to making a simple Chrome extension to do it for us - and I figured it may be useful to others too!

Oh, and don't be a stranger! Message me your ideas, let's have a chat!

Cheers,
Alex
